jetpack-related-posts.title: Preliminary schedule
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Przepraszamy, ten wpis jest dostępny tylko w języku Amerykański Angielski. For the sake of viewer convenience, the content is shown below in the alternative language. jetpack-related-posts.title: Sympozjum Avant - Laboratorium wiosny
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Serdecznie zapraszamy do udziału w interdyscyplinarnym sympozjum LABORATORIUM WIOSNY (27-28 IX 2014, Toruń), poświęconym badaniom nad współczesną muzyką i tańcem w epoce zapoczątkowanej przez Święto wiosny Igora Strawińskiego.   Dziedziny: muzykologia; badania nad choreografią i tańcem; historia muzyki współczesnej; filozofia muzyki; psychologia muzyki; kognitywistyka muzyki; socjologia muzyki; etnomuzykologia; inne powiązane.  …

jetpack-related-posts.title: Laboratory of Dance / Dance as a Vantage Point
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Interdisciplinary Symposium, July 1-3, 2020, Łódź, Poland Lab of Dance aims to build an exchange platform covering contemporary research strategies in dance studies, including, among others, emergent artistic research practices, as well as tool-disciplined cognitive science methodologies, both vividly drawing on a variety of theoretical and philosophical contexts. On such…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Mechanistic Integration and Unification in Cognitive Science
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Warsaw, June 23-26, 2016 The aim of the workshop is to discuss the recent work on mechanistic explanation, with special stress on particular problems of integration of multiple mechanistic models, robustness, and unification of partial explanations, theories and fields. There is a growing consensus that cognitive science and cognitive neuroscience…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Varieties of Meaning and Content
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The third Context, Cognition and Communication Conference will be hosted by the Institute of Philosophy, University of Warsaw. The main theme of the conference is "Varieties of Meaning and Content". The purpose of the CCC conferences is to provide a platform for philosophers, linguists and cognitive scientists for discussing issues connected with the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Wide cognition and social intelligence
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Kazimierz Dolny, Poland - August 19th to 23rd, 2013   Invited key-speakers Steve Butterfill (Warwick) Joel Krueger (Durham / Exeter) Miriam Kyselo (San Sebastian) Tad Zawidzki (George Washington) Call for papers The theme of the workshop is the significance of wide cognition – which is embodied, enacted, extended, embodied,…
